Text: Thank You everyone I am not one for goodbyes so I will say See you all later It really has been too short but sweet I have enjoyed meeting and working with all of you and I am sure that our paths will cross in the future Please feel free to call me at home or on my cell if you need to see some sun in the valley or just to bug me about my projects or to grab a margarita cannot get the Houston out of me Cheers All GAURI
